EmailTemplate.description: Use this template for sending follow up email to a prospect
EmailTemplate.name: Sales Call Follow Up - OTR Version
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Your Interest In WEX Fleet One Over The Road
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today about your interest in Fleet One®. I hope this additional information will help you make an informed decision about managing your fuel costs with a fuel card.
At Fleet One, our goal is to give you the tools to reduce your administrative hassles, saving you valuable time and resources. Once you’ve had a chance to review the attached information, please don’t hesitate to call me with questions. I would also be happy to walk you through the application process.
I have included the following documents for your review and the application for you to complete:
Features and Benefits Business Services Agreement Unit Driver List Bank Wire Instructions
To submit your application, you may fax it to {!User.Fax}; or mail to my attention at {!User.Street}, {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode}.
I look forward to the opportunity to assist you with your fuel card needs.
Thank you,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} Fleet One, LLC Phone: {!User.Phone} Fax: {!User.Fax} Email: {!User.Email} www.FleetOne.com
